name: Seekh Kabab Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Seekh Kabab Recipe: Beef (ground) ½ kg Fats 50 gms Black Pepper (Crushed) 1 tsp Red Chili Powder 1 tbsp Green cardamom Powder 1 tsp Cumin Powder 1 tbsp Fresh Coriander (Chopped) 1 bunch Green Chilies (finely chopped) 4 Ginger Garlic Paste 2 tbsp Fried Onions Paste ½ cup Roasted Chickpea Powder 2-3 tbsp Oil as required Salt to taste Coal 1 piece
instructions: Mix together beef with all spices. Process the meat in the chopper with all spices. Sew the mince on the skewers and steam fry . Lastly give dum with coal and Serve
